greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^k/(1 + x)).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
mathematica: nmax = 50; CoefficientList[Series[Product[(1 + x + x^k)/(1 + x), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 16 2019 *)
program: (PARI) N=66; x='x+O('x^N); Vec(exp(sum(k=1, N, x^k*sumdiv(k, d, (-1)^(d+1)/(d*(1+x)^d)))))
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Apr 18 2019
